instruction: the effects of the Teal blue starts too late. They should appear half a beat before the forth bar. beat 23. 21.89 ms.
reasoning: I've adjusted the timing of the teal blue accents to start at beat 23 (approximately 21899ms) instead of beat 24 as previously implemented. This creates a smoother transition half a beat before the fourth bar begins. The teal blue accents now appear on the arc segments of the first four rings (ring7, ring8, ring9, ring10) at beat 23, and then continue through the rest of the sequential build-up. This timing adjustment ensures the color transition happens at precisely the right musical moment, creating better synchronization with the song structure while maintaining the progressive ring-by-ring build-up pattern.
